title: Calories in Jason's Deli Menu Items
meta_description: Discover calories in Jason's Deli popular items like sandwiches and salads, with detailed nutrition for a California Club sandwich and tips for healthier choices.
h1: Calories in Jason's Deli Menu Items
assumptions: Full California Club sandwich on sourdough bread; includes smoked turkey, ham, bacon, avocado, Swiss cheese, mayo, lettuce, tomato; no modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, exact ingredients, portion size, and customizations. Check Jason's Deli app or menu for latest values.

quick_answer.text: A full Jason's Deli California Club sandwich contains about 1030 kcal and 49 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a Jason's Deli California Club sandwich?
faqs.a: About 1030 kcal for the full sandwich.

faqs.q: What are the macros for Jason's Deli sandwiches?
faqs.a: Varies; California Club has 92 g carbs, 52 g fat, 49 g protein.

faqs.q: Are Jason's Deli salads lower in calories?
faqs.a: Yes, many salads are 300â€“600 kcal without dressing; add-ons increase it.

faqs.q: How much sodium in Jason's Deli items?
faqs.a: High; e.g., 2490 mg in a California Club due to meats and bread.

faqs.q: Can I get lower calorie options at Jason's Deli?
faqs.a: Opt for half portions, salads, or grilled chicken items to reduce calories.
